column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=Yesterday , I woke up at 5 AM because I knew that I had a flight to catch .
#id=2
#text=I ate my breakfast and waited for my friend Wayne to pick me up because he was going to drop me off at the airport so I could board my plane .
#id=3
#text=Once I arrived at the airport I showed them my ticket for my flight to Los Angeles , California and they told me I would have to wait a few minutes .
#id=4
#text=I sat down and waited and read a few magazines before they announced that my plane was boarding .
#id=5
#text=I was checked to see if anything was on me in the security area before entering the plane .
#id=6
#text=Once I got on the plane I went to the window seat and sat down .
#id=7
#text=I put on my headphones and listened to music for about an hour .
#id=8
#text=I then was asked if I wanted food from the flight attendant .
#id=9
#text=I got myself a sandwich for lunch before we arrived shortly in Los Angeles .
#text=I got off the plane and noted that I had a very pleasant flight .
